feed.title: Jetlog Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Jetlog: v1.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixed a bug that caused the export endpoints to only export 50 flights
  • Fixed a bug that caused the flight seat to not be updated when editing
  • Fixed a bug that caused the exported files to contain quotation marks
  • Importing CSV will now abort completely if the columns are invalid
  • Various small UI Improvements and bug fixes...

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/compare/v1.0.0-beta...v1.0.0

entry.title: New release for Jetlog: v1.0.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • ðŸŽ‰ Added new "Class" field. You can choose between Private, First, Business, Economy+, and Economy
  • ðŸŽ‰ Rework and improvement of statistics and statistics page
  • You can now sort flights in the All Flights page by column (date, distance, duration, â€¦)
  • Minor UI improvements

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/compare/v1.0.0...v1.0.1

entry.title: New release for Jetlog: v1.0.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • ðŸŽ‰ Switched airport database provider to a more extensive database
  • Single flight view now shows more details about each airport
  • Improved the look of frequency-based markers
  • Fixed a bug that caused the exported CSV to contain invalid values for the ticket_class column
  • Some minor UI changes

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/compare/v1.0.1...v1.0.2

entry.title: New release for Jetlog: v1.1.0 - Multiple users!
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • ðŸŽ‰ User authentication and different accounts by @pbogre in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/48
  • ðŸŽ‰ Add aircraft side option by @adepssimius in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/59
  • Allow short usernames by @adepssimius in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/57
  • Minor UI changes

Note: upgrading to this version requires you to add a SECRET_KEY environment variable to your Docker compose file. Look at the installation wiki for more details

PS: I am sorry if this update took so long to release, in the past months I haven't had much time to dedicate to this project since I'm a college student. I don't expect this to change any time soon, but I also don't expect to stop working on Jetlog, so future releases will probably come slowly but steadily. Thanks for supporting this project of mine :)

New Contributors

  • @pbogre made their first contribution in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/48
  • @adepssimius made their first contribution in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/57

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/compare/v1.0.2...1.1.0

entry.title: New release for Jetlog: v1.1.1
entry.content:
Summary

  • Ability to fetch flight data automatically using the flight number field ðŸŽ‰
  • Statistics for airline frequency ðŸŽ‰
  • Various new fields, including airline, tail_number, purpose ðŸŽ‰
  • Flight distance and duration will now automatically update when (implicitly) edited
  • Ability to import new fields from MyFlightRadar24
  • Many UI improvements
  • Fixes related to statistics API
  • Fixes related to importing / exporting
  • CI/CD pipeline for automatic docker images
  • Various other bug fixes and enhancements

What's Changed

  • Flight fetching via callsign by @pbogre in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/76
  • Importing: Use csv module for parsing by @ClumsyAdmin in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/75
  • Add Airline Field by @cfarrell987 in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/77
  • (fix) Sanitize query inputs for airport, airline endpoints by @pbogre in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/81
  • Automatically update flight distance when updating airports by @pbogre in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/82
  • Improvements to MFR24 importing (+ import airlines) by @pbogre in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/83
  • Airline statistics, grid layout improvements by @pbogre in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/84
  • Update flight duration when editing arrival/departure times by @pbogre in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/85
  • enhancement : CI pipeline for pushing the docker image by @Helion55 in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/79

New Contributors

  • @ClumsyAdmin made their first contribution in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/75
  • @cfarrell987 made their first contribution in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/77
  • @Helion55 made their first contribution in https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/pull/79

Full Changelog: https://github.com/pbogre/jetlog/compare/1.1.0...v1.1.1
